description:
There are bounty hunters on the prowl, and most of the Straw Hats are dead drunk. Only Zoro is still sober enough to hoist a sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Explosion! The Three Swords Style! Zoro vs. Baroque Works!
Le coup d`éclat de l`escrimeur à trois sabres ! Zoro VS Baroque Works !
Sakuretsu Santouryuu! Zoro VS Baroque Works!
Стиль Трёх Мечей! Зоро против Барок Воркс!
สามดาบสะท้านโลกันต์ โซโลปะทะบาร็อคเวิร์คส
炸裂三刀流! ゾロVSバロックワークス!
